title: Developer Tools
description: Provides various development tools including code formatting, JSON validation, UUID generation, and more.

qr_code.title: QR Code Generator
qr_code.grid_description: Generate QR codes from URLs, text, and other data.
qr_code.description: Free online QR code generator tool that supports converting URLs, text, and email addresses into QR codes. Customize colors and sizes, and download in PNG format. Perfect for social media, websites, business cards, and more.
how_to_use_steps: Enter the content you want to encode in the input box, such as URLs, text, email addresses, etc.
Preview the result immediately as you type.
Download the QR Code as an image file (PNG, SVG, or JPG) for saving.
examples: Generate QR Codes for URLs to enable quick access via mobile devices.
Create QR Codes containing WiFi login information for easy guest access.
Add event information QR Codes to posters for quick links.
Include vCard format contact QR Codes on business cards.

faq.q: What types of content does the QR Code support?
faq.a: Besides URLs, you can input text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi settings, vCard formats, and more.

faq.q: Do the generated QR Codes have an expiration date?
faq.a: No. The QR Codes generated by this tool are instant image files that are not stored on any server and can be used permanently.

base64.title: Base64 Tool
base64.input_placeholder: Enter text to encode or decode
base64.error: An error occurred. Please check your input.
base64.description: Free online Base64 encoder/decoder tool that supports text, JSON, and other formats. Quickly convert text to Base64 encoding or decode Base64 back to original text.
how_to_use_steps: Enter the original text or Base64 string you want to convert.
Select the encode or decode function.
Click the 'Swap' button to switch positions.
Click the 'Clear' button to clear the input box.

faq.a: Base64 is an encoding method used to convert binary data into readable text format, commonly used for data transmission or image embedding purposes.

faq.q: Does this tool support special characters or non-English content?
faq.a: Yes, it supports all UTF-8 encoded text, including Chinese, Japanese, symbols, and emojis.

image_base64.grid_description: Convert images to Base64 format or Base64 to images.
image_base64.title: Image Base64 Encoder/Decoder Tool
image_base64.description: Easily convert your image files (supports common formats like JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP) to Base64 encoded strings. This tool quickly generates Data URLs for use in HTML, CSS, or JavaScript, allowing you to embed images directly in web pages, emails, or applications without external image links, improving load times and simplifying deployment.
image_base64.privacy_notice: Privacy Notice: All image processing is done locally in your browser and is not uploaded to any server. Your image data remains entirely on your device, ensuring data security and privacy.
image_base64.description_2: Paste a complete Base64 Data URL (e.g., `data:image/png;base64,...`), and the system will immediately decode and preview the original image. You can easily view the image content corresponding to the Base64 string and download the restored image file.
how_to_use_steps: Upload an image in the 'Encode' tab, and the system will automatically convert it to a Base64 string that you can copy for use in web pages, programs, or databases.
Switch to the 'Decode' tab, paste a string starting with 'data:image' to preview and download the image.
The tool automatically detects image formats (such as PNG, JPG, SVG) and provides corresponding download functionality.

faq.q: What is Base64 and why convert images?
faq.a: Base64 is an encoding format that converts images into plain text, commonly used for web embedding, API transmission, and offline storage without requiring additional image file management.

faq.q: What scenarios are suitable for using Base64 to represent images?
faq.a: Base64 strings are commonly used for embedding images in scenarios such as generating QR Codes, PDFs, Emails, SVG image embedding, and frontend frameworks like React/Vue.

uuid.title: UUID Generator
uuid.description: High-performance online UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) generator tool. Whether you need a single UUID or want to generate multiple in batch, this tool can immediately meet your requirements. Generated UUIDs conform to standard format and are suitable for database primary keys, distributed systems, unique identifiers, and other development scenarios, ensuring global uniqueness.
how_to_use_steps: Enter the number of UUIDs you want to generate (up to 10,000), default is 1.
Click the 'Generate' button to create random UUID values.
You can copy the results, clear them, or download the UUIDs as a TXT file for use.

faq.a: UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) is a 128-bit standard format identifier commonly used to mark data uniqueness, such as database primary keys, user IDs, device identification, etc.

faq.q: What are the characteristics of UUID v4?
faq.a: UUID v4 is a randomly generated version created through cryptographically secure random number generation algorithms, making it virtually impossible to duplicate, thus suitable for any scenario requiring global uniqueness.

faq.q: Can I use UUIDs as database primary keys?
faq.a: Yes, UUIDs are widely used as primary keys in both NoSQL and SQL databases, though they take up slightly more space compared to auto-incrementing IDs. If you value data synchronization and global uniqueness, UUIDs are an excellent choice.

json.title: JSON Formatter
json.grid_description: Format, validate, and beautify JSON data.
json.description: Free JSON formatting and compression tool that supports one-click beautification, compression, and downloading of JSON data. Whether for development debugging, API testing, or data transfer optimization, it quickly completes format adjustments. Suitable for frontend/backend development, server response parsing, and configuration file formatting, helping you quickly read and check JSON structure. Supports large JSON loading, automatic indentation, and seamless copying.
json.error: JSON format error. Please verify the content is correct.
how_to_use_steps: Paste your JSON into the input field that you want to format or compress.
Click 'Format' to automatically beautify the layout, or click 'Compress' to convert it to a single-line format.
The output result will be displayed below, and you can copy, clear, or download it as a .json file.

faq.a: JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is a lightweight data exchange format widely used in frontend-backend transmission and API data structure definition.

faq.q: Why can't my JSON be formatted?
faq.a: Please ensure you have entered valid JSON format. Common errors include missing commas, unquoted keys, or unmatched curly braces.
Yes. You can click 'Swap' to move the result back to the input field, then perform compression or format conversion.

text_stats.title: Text Counter
text_stats.grid_description: Count text length, characters, words, sentences, paragraphs, and more.
text_stats.description: Free online text counter that quickly calculates character count, word count, and line count of your input text. Perfect for article writing, presentation preparation, or social media post character limit checking. Features real-time counting, clear, and copy functionality.

how_to_use_steps.0: Enter or paste your text in the input box above.
how_to_use_steps.1: The system will automatically calculate character count, word count, and line count.
how_to_use_steps.2: Click the 'Clear' button to perform further operations.

0.q: Does this tool count punctuation marks?
0.a: Yes, character count includes punctuation marks; word count is separated by spaces or line breaks.

1.q: What's the maximum number of characters I can input?
1.a: There's no theoretical limit, but very long texts may affect performance. We recommend breaking it into smaller segments.

color_picker.title: Color Picker
color_picker.description: Professional online color picker tool that supports real-time conversion and copying of multiple color formats (HEX, HEXA, RGB, RGBA, HSL, HSLA). Whether you're working on web design, UI/UX development, graphic design, or brand color schemes, you can quickly find and copy the color codes you need. Features an intuitive color wheel picker and color code input functionality, allowing you to easily obtain precise color values.
color_picker.hint: Click the color wheel above to select a color, the color code will update automatically.
color_picker.how_to_use_title: How to Use the Color Picker?

how_to_use_steps.0: Use the color wheel to select a color, or directly input a color code in the input field.
how_to_use_steps.1: The system will automatically convert and display color values in all formats (HEX, HEXA, RGB, RGBA, HSL, HSLA).
how_to_use_steps.2: Click the copy icon next to any color value to copy that format's color code to your clipboard.

0.a: Supports multiple common formats: HEX (e.g., #FF5733), HEXA (e.g., #FF5733CC), RGB (e.g., rgb(255, 87, 51)), RGBA (e.g., rgba(255, 87, 51, 0.8)), HSL (e.g., hsl(12, 100%, 60%)), and HSLA (e.g., hsla(12, 100%, 60%, 0.8)).

1.q: How do I input color codes?
1.a: You can directly input any supported format's color code in the input field, and the system will automatically recognize and convert it to other formats. For example, you can input either #FF5733 or rgb(255, 87, 51).

2.q: Why do some color values show as original values?
2.a: If there's an issue during the color conversion process, the system will display the original input color value. Please ensure the input color code format is correct.

color_code_chart.title: Color Code Chart
color_code_chart.grid_description: View color codes for common colors.
color_code_chart.description: Provides color code references for common colors, including basic colors. Each color includes both HEX and RGB format codes for easy copying and use.

password_generator.title: Password Generator
password_generator.description: Generate secure and random passwords with options for numbers, symbols, uppercase and lowercase letters.
password_generator.copy_success_message: Password has been copied to clipboard
password_generator.copy_error_message: Unable to copy password, please copy manually

how_to_use_steps.0: Choose whether to include numbers and symbols
how_to_use_steps.2: Click generate button and copy the password

0.q: Why do we need strong passwords?
0.a: Strong passwords protect your accounts from unauthorized access. Using complex passwords that include uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols significantly reduces the risk of being cracked.

1.q: How long should my password be?
1.a: It's recommended to use passwords that are at least 12 characters long. Longer passwords are more secure, but you should also consider usability. Generally, passwords between 16-24 characters are recommended.

2.q: Why include different types of characters?
2.a: Using different types of characters (uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, symbols) increases password complexity, making it harder to crack. For example, an 8-character password using only lowercase letters has far fewer possible combinations than an 8-character password using all character types.

3.q: How should I securely store my passwords?
3.a: It's recommended to use a password manager to store your passwords. Password managers can securely store all your passwords while only requiring you to remember one master password. Never store passwords in plain text on your computer or phone.

4.q: How often should I change my passwords?
4.a: It's recommended to change your passwords every 3-6 months, especially for important accounts (such as banking, email, etc.). If you suspect your account has been compromised, change your password immediately.

url_encoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder Tool
url_encoder.description: Free URL encoding and decoding tool that converts special characters to URL-safe format or converts encoded URLs back to their original format.
url_encoder.input_placeholder: Enter URL to encode or decode
url_encoder.error: An error occurred during processing, please check your input

random.title: Random Tool
random.description: Provides various random functions including random selection, random sorting, random grouping, and random numbers.
